thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 6 of 907
thread.title: GagnierA

author: GagnierA
title: GagnierA
text: I just wanted to say that through all the transactions I've done through this website (which have been many), I've had absolutely zero problems ever! I recommend it to my friends constantly since great deals do come up somewhat frequently. Game key delivery is essentially instant and I've never gotten a key thats already been distributed to someone else (has happened on other sites). I unfortunately can't say anything about their customer support quality, but that's probably a great thing since I've never had to contact them. I'm probably safe to assume that they're all excellent people and extremely helpful though. Kudos to all involved for having such a great place to come to for exceptional money saving opportunities on quality products! Keep up the fantastic work!
